bug.short_desc: Adding an ePub-Version of the qooxdoo manual

long_desc.thetext:
It would be great to have an ePub-Version of the manual for mobile devices.
Sphinx offers an experimental epub building, but the output only displays the first four pages. Unzipping the .epub-file (after manually changing its name to .zip) and comparing it with other valid epub-examples suggests that placing the actual content in subfolders (/pages/Chapter_Name/) might cause the problem. Other working epub-files have all html-content in the root directory.
Attachment contains the not working qooxdoo.epub generated with Sphinx, a working qooxdoo-manual in ePub-Format (converted from HTML to epub with the Freeware Calibre) and a working epub-Example generated with Sphinx (ISMe.epub).
Attachment seems to be too big to submit to bugzilla.
